metadata.title: CVE-2018-10779 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
TIFFWriteScanline in tif_write.c in LibTIFF 3.8.2 has a heap-based bufferover-read, as demonstrated by bmp2tiff.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10779` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11').
